page.title: 19ARMED FORCES
page.content: THE LARGER PART OF OUR BLOCK IS THE TRIANGULAR SHAPED PIECE OF LAND,ABOUT 2,000 ACRES KNOWN AS BARRY LINKS.IT IS BOUNDED BY THE RAILWAY, THE FIRTH OF TAY AND THE NORTH SEA.FOR OVER A CENTURY THIS LAND HAS BEEN OWNED BY THE GOVERNMENT AND IS USED FOR TRAINING MAINLY PART TIME SOLDIERS,IN PARACHUTE PRACTICE AND SHOOTING. PRACTICE IS CARRIED ON THROUGHOUT THE SUMMER MONTHS. AT THE SOUTHREN APEX OF THIS TRIANGLE IS SITUATED BUDDON NESS.IT WAS HERE THAT 2 LIGHTHOUSES WERE BUILT AND USED IN THE ESTUARY OF THE RIVER TAY.THESE HAVE NOW BEEN REPLACED BY BUOYS.
